title: Dine with Love
overview: The owner of the fresh food platform, Yu Hao, sponsors and participates in a cooking show to promote his company. Yu Hao's behavior angered the show's team, because efficiency is a priority for him, he does not want to waste time learning how to cook, so he is filmed with an understudy. When the truth became known, public opinion descended on the company.Su Ke Lan was appointed Director of Public Relations. When Yu Hao was in danger, she took responsibility to deal with the crisis and became Yu Hao's culinary teacher. She led him into the kitchen and slowly began to penetrate his heart.
